<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Inventory Resource Details</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/dlp/api/v1/inventory/resource/details"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns details for the resource (bucket) with the specified tenant ID and bucket name.

## Request
